H0.text: Alan Minter was World boxing champion at which weight. Lightweight

H1.text: Alan Minter was World boxing champion at which weight. Welterweight

H2.text: Alan Minter was World boxing champion at which weight. Light Middleweight

H3.text: Alan Minter was World boxing champion at which weight. Middleweight

A4.text: He held the undisputed middleweight title in 1980.
